attributes.action: Link MP's wages to National Average Earnings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why not relate MP's salaries to national average earnings (maybe 1.5x). This would slightly reduce MP's wages currently, and give them a vested interest in how EVERYONE in the country is doing financially. Also, why not convert one old london tower block into flats for MP's, and scrap the second home allowance in one go. LET'S STOP THE GRAVY TRAIN AND SNOUTS IN TROUGHS!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
